title: Hextech loot issue
body: So Ive had at least 5 games with an S in the past 20 games. Ive been honored in almost every one of those 20 games and I haven't received a key fragment at all. Riot says that loot system is working as intended despite error message. That doesn't seem to ring true for me. IDK ive never got very many key fragments at all, but I also dont seem to get as many S grades as I have been lately.

replies.body: You've been getting a steady flow of fragments over the last few weeks, but the drop reduces each time you get some.  You have a limit to 12, until it resets about ~28 days.  You'll keep getting more fragments at a slower rate, until that refresh occurs for you.  More info on our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide as well!
why cant we get an indicator in the profile section of the client for key fragments like we get for chests

That's a great suggestion!  You should suggest this over at our[ client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards for the client dev team to consider.  Thanks!
